name: guard-spec
effect: Used on a party Pokémon in battle : Protects the target’s stats from being lowered for the next five turns. Increases happiness by 1/1/0.
short_effect: Prevents stat changes in battle for five turns in battle. Raises happiness.

flavor_text.sword_shield: An item that prevents stat reduction among the Trainer’s party Pokémon for five turns after it is used in battle.
